attributes.action: Hand washing facilities throughout the UK & Ireland in public places.
attributes.additional_details: To ensure cleanliness throughout the UK and to prevent spreading Covid-19 to more communities and also to prevent more deaths.
attributes.background: Due to the outbreak of covid-19, it would be ideal for porta-a-sinks (hand washing facilities) to get installed throughout the UK & Ireland in public places, to enable the general public to wash their hands on the go. Facilities can be completely hands free by sensors so no contact would needed.
